DataElement.preferredDefinition: The explanation of the reason for the surgical approach or technique.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Procedure Domain Surgical Procedure Technique Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
